# calorie - Clash Voting Platform

## Overview
calorie is a modern voting platform that allows users to create and participate in visual voting contests (clashes). Users can upload images, create voting polls, and share them with others.

## Key Features
- Create visual voting contests with custom images
- Real-time voting with device fingerprinting to prevent duplicate votes
- Share voting links with others
- Analytics and insights for clash creators
- Responsive design for all devices
- One-time payment model for lifetime access

## Pages Structure
- Homepage: Landing page with features, pricing, and call-to-action
- Vote pages: Dynamic voting pages for each clash (/vote/[slug])
- Dashboard: Private area for clash creators
- Login: Authentication page
- About: Information about the platform
- Pricing: One-time $20 lifetime access

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 15 with React 19
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Supabase for database
- NextAuth for authentication
- FingerprintJS for device identification

## SEO Keywords
- voting platform
- visual voting
- image voting
- clash voting
- online polls
- voting contests
- one-time payment
- lifetime access
- $20 lifetime

## Contact
For more information about calorie, visit the homepage or contact support.
